Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Prohibits board members of a cooperative housing corporation to serve as the listing agent for the co-op associated with their board status in a real estate transaction
Summary: Prohibits board members of a cooperative housing corporation to serve as the listing agent for the co-op associated with their board status in a real estate transaction.
LawCode: Add ยง78, Coop Corps L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the cooperative corporations law, in relation to prohibiting board members of a cooperative housing corporation to serve as the listing agent for the co-op associated with their board status in a real estate transaction
